CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1969, pg. 31 reads: "Conference Cabinet Guests - at the closing session of the Allegheny AME Zion 123rd annual meeting, held at Wesley Center Church, join with the Presiding Bishop W.A. Hilliard, fourth from left, extending a formal greeting to Calvin C. Calahan, right foreground, who had come all the way from Oakland, Calif., to visit the conference. Others in picture reading from left are, Dr. David H. Bradley, chairman of budget committee; Mrs. Emma B. Watson, general president; Bishop C.H. Foggie, associate; Dr. A.L. Pierce, Presiding Elder; Rev. V.R. Hill, conference host; Mrs. W.A. Hilliard, supervisor; Dr. E.W. Gantt, guest Presiding Elder; Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, secretary, budget committee; Rev. K .Melvin Smith, Sacramento, Calif., and Rev. George Kendall, Wesley Center pastor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, including in first row: Rev. A. L. Pierce, unknown woman, Rev. Gantt, Bishop Charles H. Foggie, Mrs. and Bishop Hilliard, unknown woman, Mary Meeks, and Willa Mae Rice second from right; second row: Rev. George Kendall second from left, Virgil Hill, and Eugene Morgan fourth from right, posed behind altar rail, in Wesley Center AME Zion Church
